pages.title: No Natural Spawn Option
pages.text: The Following Pages are recipes to the basics. All Chocobos can be gotten

pages.title: Chocobo Feather
pages.text: -$(item)Wheat Seed$()$(br)-$(item)Chicken Feather$()$(br)Used for the base Recipes & ChocoDisguise Armor

pages.title: Chocobo Feather
pages.text: -$(item)Wheat Seed$()$(br)-$(item)Chicken Feather$()$(br)-$(item)Chocobo Feather$()$(br)Useful for food & breeding

pages.title: Chocobo Feather
pages.text: -$(item)Chicken Egg()$(br)-$(item)Crimson Fungus$()$(br)-$(item)Chocobo Feather$()$(br)Use to spawn a flame Chocobo. Will drop feathers like normal.

pages.title: Chocobo Feather
pages.text: -$(item)Chicken Egg()$(br)-$(item)wheat$()$(br)-$(item)Chocobo Feather$()$(br)Use to spawn a Yellow Chocobo. Will drop feathers like normal.
